lead_paragraph: ALBANY -- Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, saying he was startled by problems with the handling of abuse and neglect allegations at state facilities, on Wednesday vowed reforms at six agencies that provide residential care for the disabled, the elderly, children and the mentally ill.

headline.main: Cuomo Vows Reforms at Residential Care Agencies
